short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Catch the green square from your cursor, without touching the moving red circles! Inbuilt high score & amazing animation!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple yet fun game to play when you just want to take a small break! Just hit the green squares with your cursor without being touched by the red moving dots

Inbuilt high-score functionality with amazingly good animations! Just a small popup without the need to open another tab
